job description:
Link Technologies (LinkTechConsulting.com), a Las Vegas, NV based staffing and IT consulting firm, is seeking a Big Data Engineer for a 6 + months contract with a well-established client in Las Vegas, NV.

Position Title: Big Data Engineer

Major Areas of Responsibility:
· Mandatory Skills
· Experience designing Big Data solutions
· Experience with Hadoop (HDinsight).
· Experience with Map-Reduce, Zookeeper, HDFS, Pig, Sqoop and Hive.
· Experience with scheduling tools like Control-M and Oozie
· Experience in Azure for Big Data/DWH technologies
· Strong subject matter expertise on the Big Data ecosystem (Hadoop, HBase, Cassandra, Spark, MPP databases etc.).

Candidate must have hands on experience in one or more of these technologies.
· In depth knowledge of one of HortonWorks or Cloudera stacks.
· Excellent communication skills and proven collaboration skills
· Preferred Skills
· Strong knowledge/experience in migrating to/green field development in Azure strongly preferred
· Experience monitoring Hadoop cluster performance
· Experience with SSIS and SQL Server
· Experience with programming language like Python or C#
· Understanding of ETL principles and how to apply them within Hadoop

Working Conditions:
· fast pace

Additional Information:
· All candidates must be legally eligible to work for any employer in the United States without sponsorship or a third party employer.
· This role is on-site; remote work is not an option unless otherwise specified.
